content: i just love the elephant and piggie books perhaps you know a young reader who loves these characters too inspired by the fantastic mo willems series for young readers elephant and piggie now you can make your own cuddly friends for elephant worsted-weight yarn in light gray brand used red heart super saver size g hook 4 mm crochet hook fiberfill or stuffing needle with a large eye white felt black embroidery thread or black yarn black felt or fabric paint for eye fabric glue or white needle-and-thread for piggie worsted-weight yarn in pink brand used red heart super saver size g hook 4 mm crochet hook fiberfill or stuffing needle with a large eye black felt black needle-and-thread or fabric glue black embroidery thread this pattern is at an easy level you need to know how to single_crochet in the round increase decrease slip_stitch and crochet in the back loop only pattern includes 5 pages of detailed instruction in english and color photos to help guide you along elephant will measure about 9 5 inches tall and piggie will measure around 8 inches tall depending on yarn gauge and type *interested in any of my other patterns but are nervous about purchasing this pattern is a great example of how my other patterns are formatted and written if you like this one you might enjoy some of my other designs * this is a free pattern please don t sell or redistribute any copies of this pattern via email or printed or in any other form finished products made may be sold but please credit my pattern pattern has not been beta tested please let me know if you come across any errors
